message: Let's split fairly and end this quickly.  This gives us both a good share.
I understand you wanting to split fairly, but I'm feeling a bit greedy this round.  Let's swap amounts and we can call it even.
Okay, no problem. How about we meet in the middle? This round I get a bit more since you rejected my previous offer.
I appreciate you moving towards the middle.  How about we nudge it just a bit more in my favor and we can wrap this up?
Time is running out, Bob.  This is practically an even split.  Take it or leave it.
